full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MI SKAR MI CHEN LNGA PO LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL BDUD RTZI'I ZHUN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(CES MI SKAR MI CHEN LNGA PO LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL BDUD RTZI'I ZHUN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MI SKAR LNGA PO NI SROG LUS DBANG THANG @014B RLUNG RTA DPAL LDAN LHA RNAMS KYI ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI GSER SKYEMS 'BUL ZHES NA GANG BSAM LAS LA MYUR DU 'GRUB PA YIN SNGON KHA DZA; MAN NGAG YIN NO, THE TSOM MED CING SHIN TU NGES PAR ZAB GU RU HYA AU BA TI SHA SA MA YA, MI NAD PHYUGS NAD GOD KHA ZHI BA DANG, SROG LUS DBANG THANG RLUNG RTA DAD PA DANG, ,TSE BSOD DPAL 'BYOR SNYAN GRAGS SPEL BA DANG, ,LUNG RTOGS DAM PA NOR BU BA GAM RTZER, GNYIS RGYAL MTSAN 'DZIN PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO, ,CES PA 'DI NI TSA HAR DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN SPON KHA DZA MAN NGAG BZHIN DU SBYAR BA'O, ,BSAM DON THAMS CAD MYUR DU 'GRUB PAR SHOG , AOm BDE LEGS SU GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,MANGGA LAm, ,
